metadata.title: CVE-2023-52805 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:jfs: fix array-index-out-of-bounds in diAllocCurrently there is not check against the agno of the iag whileallocating new inodes to avoid fragmentation problem. Added the checkwhich is required.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
